zone.line: Not to be checked, & not ?but to be confined
It oversoars the light: outspeeding mind
there joy sense serene Infancy
What is that joy which happy
Percieves not as the hours ?content them
Regrets blossoms by
In Each in a chains of flowers, & yet enjoys
?quaint
The shapes of this new world & all ?its toys;
?pensioners ?best ?pilgrims
Wrought by ?the these busy ?trifler, ever new...
Remembrance borrows fancys glass, to shew
This these scene forms move clear
sincrecere
Than now they are, than then, perhaps, they were.

line.del: The colours of the sky & of the streams

zone.line: When every thing familiar seemed seems to be
Wonderful, and the immortality
Of the great world, which all things must inherit,
awakening
Is Was felt as one with the unconscious spirit
Unconscious of itself, & of the strange
Distinctions, which in its proceeding change
It feels & knows, and keeps ?mirrors, as if each were
